name: Shooting Zombie Adventure
description:
Zombie apocalypse is here and walkers are everywhere. In a world overrun with the dead, you have survived. But for how long? Came up fast, out of nowhere. There is nowhere to hide and the only way to survive is to kill the dead before they get to you and eat your brains. Brace yourself and survive the long night of the undead.

Features:
- Action-packed & story-based game
- Explore the city
- Beautiful and realistic game graphics
- Full 3D characters and environments
- Intuitive touch screen controls
- HD quality
